title: Baby Gender Reveal
description: Short clip of Jennifer and Aaron's Baby Gender Reveal Party showing the reveal itself and the reactions of the family.

title: Chris and Jennifer Swimming
description: Ryan breaks scientific barriers with groundbreaking experiments, Chris and Jennifer distastefully pretend to be mentally challenged as a joke for - like - 30 minutes... without stopping... in a tiny inflatable pool. As a joke.

title: Xmas 2001 - Young Jordan and Hope
description: Christmas 2001 - Jennifer and Jordan remorselessly celebrate grandma being trampled by reindeer, Ryan generates fashion buzz by adding a beanie to his ensemble, Chris plays piano and it sounds as good as you'd expect Richard Marx to sound played with one arm

title: Xmas 1992 and Ryan Flutophone Recital
description: Christmas 1992 - Ryan describes a gift as 'chocolatey', Chris dons the armor of his ancestors, Jennifer establishes dominance over everyone, grandkids receive rubberband guns from Poppy.

title: Chris Basketball Debut, Jordan Bday, Jennifer's Play, and Easter
description: Chris - in his first year at BBA - sends shockwaves through East Baton Rouge parish as he definitely takes the crown as the league's MVOAP (Most Valuable One-Armed Player). *this video also contains scenes from Jordan's birthday and a play where Jennifer has a perm.
